feed.title: BIPS! Bitcoin in Pictures & Stories
feed.subtitle: Bitcoin is really complex. Pictures and stories are nice and simple. Here the two worlds collide to demystify the technical, game theory, and economic concepts in bitcoin.

entry.title: Finally Bitcoin in Pictures!
entry.content:
“Hmmmm…. this rabbit hole is deep. I sure wish it was a little bit less fucking confusing” Everybody, about 6 weeks after they said I wonder what bnitcoin is.

The purpose of this site is to attempt to try and demystify some of the concepts in the bitcoin ecosystem through a series of pictures, recorded white board explainers and short stories.
entry.summary: “Hmmmm…. this rabbit hole is deep. I sure wish it was a little bit less fucking confusing” Everybody, about 6 weeks after they said I wonder what bnitcoin is.
